Subjects: death, approach of; advice, spiritual; aphorisms
_description: Exhortations to be prepared for death — four quatrains

BosPLMed94.First Lines:
Grounde the in paciensBlynd notht þi consciensDo þi
                    god ReuerensThankand him ay…
BosPLMed94.Last Lines:
…Þu wate notht quhen to dequhill þou art heir prouid
                    þeThat þi saule may beBroutht in to ese
BosPLMed94.Note:
Fourth lines of each quatrain written to right of other
                    three.
